itemListElement.description: Harry Angel is a private investigator. He is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer called Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.

itemListElement.description: Eight medical students on a ski trip to Norway discover that Hitler’s horrors live on when they come face to face with an unimaginable menace: Nazi zombies intent on devouring anyone unfortunate enough to wander into the remote mountains where they were once sent to die.

itemListElement.description: Clara, a lonely nurse from the outskirts of Sao Paulo, is hired by mysterious and wealthy Ana as the nanny of her unborn child. Against all odds, the two women develop a strong bond. But a fateful night changes their plans.
itemListElement.descriptionHtml: Clara, a lonely nurse from the outskirts of Sao Paulo, is hired by mysterious and wealthy Ana as the nanny of her unborn child. Against all odds, the two women develop a strong bond. But a fateful night changes their plans. [Portuguese, On Demand] Aired on May-1

itemListElement.description: It’s been ten years since the lives of siblings Tim and Kaylie Russell were shattered and Tim was convicted of murdering their parents. Now released from a mental institution, Tim wants to move on, but his sister has other plans. Kaylie blames their childhood nightmare on the Lasser Glass – an antique mirror with a grisly history – which she intends to destroy by any means possible, even as the mysterious entity continues to cast sinister spells on anyone who gazes into it.
itemListElement.descriptionHtml: It’s been ten years since the lives of siblings Tim and Kaylie Russell were shattered and Tim was convicted of murdering their parents. Now released from a mental institution, Tim wants to move on, but his sister has other plans. Kaylie blames their childhood nightmare on the Lasser Glass – an antique mirror with a grisly history – which she intends to destroy by any means possible, even as the mysterious entity continues to cast sinister spells on anyone who gazes into it. [English, On Demand] Aired on Jun-1
itemListElement.name: Oculus
itemListElement.shortDescription: A woman tries to exonerate her brother, who was convicted of murder, by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon.
itemListElement.shortDescriptionHtml: A woman tries to exonerate her brother, who was convicted of murder, by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon. [English, On Demand] Aired on Jun-1

itemListElement.description: The makers of Train To Busan unleash their latest epic zombie thriller where a darkness looms over ancient Korea and sets Humans vs. Night Demons! Prince Ganglim, one of King Lee Cho's sons who is known for his superior skills in martial-arts, comes back to Joseon after his long captivity from the Qing Dynasty, only to find his home country swarmed with Night Demons. Will Prince Ganglim successfully stop this rampage and save the country?
itemListElement.descriptionHtml: The makers of Train To Busan unleash their latest epic zombie thriller where a darkness looms over ancient Korea and sets Humans vs. Night Demons! Will Prince Ganglim successfully stop this rampage and save the country? [Korean, SBS VICELAND] Aired on May-6

itemListElement.shortDescription: The makers of Train To Busan unleash their latest epic zombie thriller where a darkness looms over ancient Korea and sets Humans vs. Night Demons!

itemListElement.description: During the reign of the first emperor of China, an ingenious torturer concocted an elixir that paralysed its victim's limbs, while increasing the sensitivity of their nerve endings tenfold. Kept in a jade skull, the elixir could provoke sensations in infinite variations--everything from erotic caresses to appalling lacerations. Haunted by the desire to experience the extreme sensations caused by the elixir, the executioner kills himself with his own poison, intensifying his death experience.
itemListElement.descriptionHtml: During the reign of the first emperor of China, an ingenious torturer concocted an elixir that paralysed its victim's limbs, while increasing the sensitivity of their nerve endings tenfold. Haunted by the desire to experience the extreme sensations caused by the elixir, the executioner kills himself with his own poison, intensifying his death experience. [Cantonese, On Demand] Aired on Oct-23

itemListElement.description: Newcomers to the remote Australian desert town of Nathgari, Catherine and Matthew Parker's lives are flung into crisis when they discover their two teenage kids, Tommy and Lily, have mysteriously disappeared just before a massive dust storm hits. With Nathgari eerily smothered in red dust and darkness, the townsfolk join the search led by local cop, David Rae. It soon becomes apparent that something terrible may have happened to  the children. Suspicion is cast, rumours spread and the town begins to turn against the Parkers.

itemListElement.description: After waking up from a coma following in car accident, Trang wakes up having lost all her memory. She starts seeing a ghost of a lady with blood-filled eyes wandering around her. She decides to investigate the case and discovers unimaginable secrets.

itemListElement.description: The small fishing community Antonio Bay is suddenly plagued by a strange, glowing fog. From the fog, the ghosts of people killed 100 years earlier appear, seeking revenge on the little community who sentenced them to death.
itemListElement.descriptionHtml: The small fishing community Antonio Bay is suddenly plagued by a strange, glowing fog. From the fog, the ghosts of people killed 100 years earlier appear, seeking revenge on the little community who sentenced them to death. [English, On Demand] Aired on Dec-1

itemListElement.description: In a remote village in the Peruvian Andes, the mysterious death of a local shepherd unveils a shocking secret buried for centuries. It will seduce the ones involved in its discovery into the darkest valleys of human nature, where ruthless selfishness results in violent madness.
itemListElement.descriptionHtml: In a remote village in the Peruvian Andes, the mysterious death of a local shepherd unveils a shocking secret buried for centuries. It will seduce the ones involved in its discovery into the darkest valleys of human nature, where ruthless selfishness results in violent madness. [Spanish, On Demand] Aired on Sep-30
itemListElement.name: The Light On The Hill
itemListElement.shortDescription: Greed and superstition overcomes the residents of a remote Peruvian village following the death of a local shepherd. Words of an ancient treasure hidden on the shepherd's land spreads.
itemListElement.shortDescriptionHtml: Greed and superstition overcomes the residents of a remote Peruvian village following the death of a local shepherd. Words of an ancient treasure hidden on the shepherd's land spreads. [Spanish, On Demand] Aired on Sep-30

itemListElement.description: When police officer Carter discovers a blood-soaked man limping down a deserted road, he rushes him to a local hospital with a barebones, night shift staff. As cloaked, cult-like figures surround the building, the patients and staff inside start to turn ravenously insane. Trying to protect the survivors, Carter leads them into the depths of the hospital where they discover a gateway to immense evil.

As cloaked, cult-like figures surround the building, the patients and staff inside start to turn ravenously insane. Trying to protect the survivors, Carter leads them into the depths of the hospital where they discover a gateway to immense evil. [English, On Demand] Aired on Jun-1
itemListElement.name: The Void
itemListElement.shortDescription: Shortly after delivering a patient to an understaffed hospital, a police officer experiences strange and violent occurrences seemingly linked to a group of mysterious hooded figures.
itemListElement.shortDescriptionHtml: Shortly after delivering a patient to an understaffed hospital, a police officer experiences strange and violent occurrences seemingly linked to a group of mysterious hooded figures. [English, On Demand] Aired on Jun-1

itemListElement.description: A young lawyer, Arthur Kipps, is ordered to travel to a remote village and sort out a recently deceased client’s papers. As he works alone in the client’s isolated house, Kipps begins to uncover tragic secrets, his unease growing when he glimpses a mysterious woman dressed only in black. Receiving only silence from the locals, Kipps is forced to uncover the true identity of the Woman in Black on his own, leading to a desperate race against time when he discovers her true intent.
itemListElement.descriptionHtml: A young lawyer, Arthur Kipps, is ordered to travel to a remote village and sort out a recently deceased client’s papers. itemListElement.name: The Woman In Black
itemListElement.shortDescription: A young lawyer travels to a remote village where he discovers the vengeful ghost of a scorned woman is terrorising the locals.
itemListElement.shortDescriptionHtml: A young lawyer travels to a remote village where he discovers the vengeful ghost of a scorned woman is terrorising the locals. [English, On Demand] Aired on Jun-1

itemListElement.description: An alien in the guise of a seductive woman (Scarlett Johansson) prowls the streets of Glasgow in search of prey - unsuspecting men who fall under her spell. The victims are then stripped and consumed. However, existence in all its complexity begin to change the alien visitor.

itemListElement.description: Popular high school student Cayden Richards wakes from a horrific nightmare, only to realise that he's living it... He is changing into something vicious, unpredictable and wild. Forced to hit the road after the brutal murder of his parents, Cayden tries to hunt down the truth of what he is.

collection.name: Fright Night
collection.description: Kick start your heart with this range of cult thrillers and horror flicks, guaranteed to send a chill down any spine.
